property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: Path on the local filesystem where the NameNode stores the namespace and transactions logs persistently.

property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.description: Comma separated list of paths of the local storage devices with corresponding types on a DataNode where it should store its blocks.

property.name: dfs.datanode.rdma.port
property.description: Specify the port to be used for establishing RDMA connections (default is 9999).
